name: Green Mountain Flight Academy
about: Green Mountain Flight Academy, established in 2011 by Mansfield Helifight, is a premier flight school in Vermont, offering both helicopter and airplane flight instruction. Located at Mansfield Heliflightâ€™s Heliport in Milton and Burlington International Airport, our unique settings provide students with experience in both controlled and non-controlled environments. Our instructors, with years of experience and impeccable safety records, are vetted professionals from airlines, corporate aviation, and the armed services. We provide high-quality training from the first lesson to professional pilot certification, with a primary goal of safety. Our fleet includes a Cessna 172, Piper Warrior, and Piper Aztec. With access to state-of-the-art facilities and stunning views of Lake Champlain and the Green Mountains, we are dedicated to helping you achieve your aviation dreams. Contact us to schedule a flight and start your journey to becoming a pilot.
